programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy drama starring Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins. Media tycoon William Parrish has lived a rich life in every sense, but fears that his days are numbered. programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story starring Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner and Jared Leto. In the mid-1980s, macho, homophobic rodeo rider Ron Woodroof is stunned to discover that he is HIV-positive. He begins to research the illness, and soon becomes convinced that a new, experimental treatment is the most effective way to prolong his life. programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down

programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. programme.desc: With a playoff place the minimum expectation, an unbeaten run of games has Salford close in on the top seven. But fan unrest prompts Gary Neville to make some big changes. Ep 2.

programme.title: PL Retro: Man Utd v Tottenham
programme.desc: Manchester United welcome Tottenham to Old Trafford on the final day of the 1998-99 Premier League season. A win for Utd would secure them the title - and keep them on track for the treble.

programme.title: PL Years 03/04: Invincibles
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic season in the Premier League, as Arsene Wenger's Arsenal steamrollered all opposition on their way to the title as they completed a remarkable unbeaten season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Ipswich/Man Utd 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Ipswich Town, the 3-2 win over Manchester United in September 1994.

programme.title: PL Greatest: M'boro/Man City 2008
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 49 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Middlesbrough, the 8-1 hammering of Man City back in May 2008.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Newcastle/Man Utd 1996
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic game from the Premier League. Here, Newcastle United enjoy a memorable afternoon at St James' Park as they rip apart Man Utd in a 5-0 destruction.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man Utd/Norwich 2015
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Norwich City, the 2-1 win over Manchester United in December 2015.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 97/98
programme.desc: Relive some of the best goals in years gone by from the Premier League. Here, the finest strikes from the 97-98 campaign, a year in which Arsenal took their first Premier League crown.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Wayne Rooney
programme.desc: A celebration of the players to have bagged 100 goals or more in the Premier League. This episode features the best goals of Everton and Manchester United's Wayne Rooney.

programme.title: PL Legends: Neville
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Premier League. Here the focus is on former Manchester United full-back Gary Neville.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Sheff Weds/N Forest 95
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Nottingham Forest, the 7-1 win at Sheffield Wednesday back in the 1994-95 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Oldham/So'ton 1993
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Oldham Athletic, the 4-3 win over Southampton in 1993 that secured the Latics' survival.

programme.title: PL Greatest: P'mouth/So'ton 2005
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Portsmouth, the 4-1 win over local rivals Southampton back in April 2005.

programme.title: PL Greatest: QPR/Liverpool 2012
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For QPR, the 3-2 win over Liverpool that saw Rangers score three in the last 13 minutes.

programme.title: Premier League Years 2004/05
programme.desc: Take a look at all of the most memorable moments from the 2004-2005 Premier League season. It was to be a memorable season for new manager José Mourinho, as his Chelsea side won the title.

programme.title: The Big Interview: Harvey Elliott
programme.sub-title: E2 ║ After debuting for Liverpool at only 16, Harvey Elliott's rise in football has been rapid. He discusses his journey
programme.desc: from anxiety after an injury to support from his family.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Ahead of their Premier League bow, catch up with the players and manager of Luton Town, as they look to blaze a trail through the top flight of English football.

programme.title: PL Retro: Leicester v Man United
programme.desc: A classic Premier League match as Leicester City hosted Manchester United at the King Power Stadium in 2014. Down 3-1, the Foxes would make a remarkable comeback.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Craven Cottage stages an all-London Premier League affair, as Fulham host Brentford. Bobby de Cordova-Reid scored the winning goal in Fulham's 1-0 win over Everton last weekend. (19.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton pay a visit to Craven Cottage in the Premier League. Previously, an Alex Iwobi injury-time winner saw Fulham record only their second victory at Old Trafford since 1963. (01.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Still deep in trouble following defeat last weekend, Burnley pay a Premier League visit to Fulham. The goals dried up for the hosts previously, as they lost 3-0 away to Newcastle. (23.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Luton's next Premier League test comes at Craven Cottage. The hosts Fulham are looking to bounce back from a heavy defeat away to Manchester City before the international break. (16.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A struggling Sheffield United travel to Fulham's Craven Cottage in the Premier League. The Blades picked up a sixth defeat in seven away to West Ham previously. (07.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Attentions turn back to the pitch for Liverpool with the visit of Bournemouth to Anfield. The Reds struggled on opening weekend of the new season, drawing at Stamford Bridge. (19.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Burnley arrive at Liverpool having recovered a point from a losing position for the first time this season against Fulham. The Reds' title pursuit took a hit in London previously. (10.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: In a year that saw Aston Villa win 15 home Premier League games in a row, Unai Emery's side look to cap a scintillating 2023 with victory over strugglers Burnley at Villa Park. (30.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Roy Hodgson's Crystal Palace are the visitors to Kenilworth Road as Luton Town's bid for top-flight survival resumes. Both sides were dealt defeat prior to the international break. (25.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Newcastle refocus their Premier League efforts on Luton at Kenilworth Road here. A 17-year-old Lewis Miley found himself on the scoresheet in the Magpies' top-flight win a week ago. (23.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest are the visitors at Luton's Kenilworth Road for this Premier League contest. Since beating West Ham a month ago, Forest have lost three on the spin. (16.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Luton welcome Sheffield United to Kenilworth Road. It was a precious Premier League point tinged with disappointment for Rob Edwards' men last weekend, drawing 4-4 at St James'. (10.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: With the reality of life in the top flight setting in, Luton's search for a Premier League win continues as they host Wolves at Kenilworth Road. The visitors also lost last weekend. (23.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: A win in the derby and a return to winning ways on the road, City are back at the Etihad hosting Bournemouth. For the first time this season, Bournemouth secured victory last week. (04.11).

programme.desc: Martin Tyler digs into the Premier League Archive and revisits some of his favourite moments from past games between Manchester United and Manchester City.

programme.title: The Tyler Archives:L'pool v United
programme.desc: Martin Tyler digs into the Premier League Archive and revisits some of his favourite moments from past games between Liverpool and Manchester United.

programme.title: Class of '92: Full Time
programme.desc: With wholesale changes over the summer, Salford's new manager has just five weeks of pre-season to transform the team ahead of another promotion push. Contains strong language. Ep 3.

programme.title: PL Retro: West Ham v Spurs 2007
programme.desc: In this classic encounter from the 2006-07 campaign, West Ham welcome rivals Tottenham Hotspur to Upton Park for a thrilling, end-to-end London derby in the Premier League.

programme.title: Chelsea: Premier Lge Years 05/06
programme.desc: A look back at the best moments from the 2005-06 season in England's top flight. Chelsea were aiming for back-to-back Premiership titles and Arsenal were in their final season at Highbury.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Reading/WHU '07
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Reading, the 6-0 hammering of West Ham at the Madejski Stadium in 2007.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Sheff Utd/Arsenal 2006
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Sheffield United, the 1-0 win over Arsenal at Bramall Lane in December 2006.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Sheff Weds/Man U 1998
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Sheffield Wednesday, the 3-1 win over Man Utd back in November 1998.

programme.title: PL Greatest: So'ton/Man Utd 1996
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Southampton, the nine-goal thriller with Man Utd that ended 6-3 to Saints.

programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, enjoy some incredible goals from the 2000-01 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Stoke/L'Pool '15
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Stoke City, the 6-1 win over Liverpool on the final day of the 2014-15 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: N'castle/S'land 2013
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Sunderland, the 3-0 win at rivals Newcastle in 2013, their first there in 13 years.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Swindon/Man Utd 1994
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Swindon Town, the 2-2 draw with Man Utd at the County Ground in March 1994.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Watford/Liverpool 2015
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Watford, the 3-0 win over Liverpool at Vicarage Road in December 2015.

programme.desc: Following defeat at the Emirates, United host Brighton. The visitors beat Newcastle previously, as Evan Ferguson became just the fourth teenager to net a Premier League hat-trick. (16.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Days after meeting in the EFL Cup, United and Palace clash again at Old Trafford. In United's last Premier League outing, they picked up a much-needed win away at Turf Moor. (30.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Still firmly in contention for the top four, Manchester United host Marco Silva's Fulham as Rasmus Hojlund looks to extend his run of scoring in six successive Premier League games. (24.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Having stole victory at the death away at Fulham a week ago, United suffered a midweek European setback. Can Ten Hag and his side bounce back in the Premier League at home to Luton? (11.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Manchester United host Nottingham Forest at Old Trafford in the Premier League. After a defeat at Spurs, the hosts look to kickstart their campaign with a convincing performance. (26.08).

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Aston Villa v N. Forest
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Nottingham Forest at Villa Park in an enthralling, end-to-end encounter that saw 10 goals.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: C'Ship 19/20
programme.desc: West London sides collide in the Sky Bet Championship play-off final at Wembley as Brentford and Fulham go head-to-head for the final place in next season's Premier League.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 1 19/20

programme.desc: The Sky Bet League Two Play-Off final from Wembley Stadium, as two teams battle it out to reach League One.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Leeds Utd

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Sheff Utd

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Charlton v Doncaster

programme.title: EFL Cup Retro 15: Chelsea v Spurs

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Coventry City v Fulham
